page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {Family life in Glenravel}appears to be keeping up with{modern living.}The majority of people have a car in fact some families have two cars. A car in Glenravel is really a necessity for people travelling to work due to the poor bus service. Every household would have eletricity, washing machines running water and all modern amenities.This has happened in the last ten years when people have modernized their homes. Every family has certain times for getting up in the morning and for going to bed at night. They also usually have rules like,{You're not {allowed to walk on the good carpet {with dirty boots on}Or {Don't throw {papers on the floor. }Most families have their do's and dont's.
